verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that ye may <S%H3925>learn<s%> them, and <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, even <S%H587>us,<s%> <S%H428>who<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> of us <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you face to <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

(I <S%H595><s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and you at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and went not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> into the <S%H2022>mount;)<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

I <S%H595><s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> thee any graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> or <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478><s%> or <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> bow down <S%H7812>thyself<s%> unto them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me,
And <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto <S%H505>thousands<s%> of them that <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5375>taketh<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it, <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee.
Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H5647>labor,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy work: <S%H4399><s%>

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> in it thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> nor thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> nor thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> nor thy <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> nor thy <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> nor thine <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor thine <S%H2543>ass,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> nor thy <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within thy <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thy <S%H5650>manservant<s%> and thy <S%H519>maidservant<s%> may <S%H5117>rest<s%> as well as thou.

And <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> through a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee to <S%H6213>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Honor <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee; <S%H4616>that<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged,<s%> and <S%H4616>that<s%> it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee.
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7523>kill.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou commit <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against thy <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H2530>desire<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H183>covet<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> or his <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> or his <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> thing <S%H834>that<s%> is thy <S%H7453>neighbor's.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>assembly<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and of the thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and he added no <S%H3254>more.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when ye <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> (for the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> did <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire,)<s%> that ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and your <S%H2205>elders;<s%>

And ye <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> and his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> and we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and he <S%H2425>liveth.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H4100>why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> us: <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H5750><s%> then we shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is there of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as <S%H3644>we<s%> have, and <S%H2421>lived?<s%>

Go thou <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H859><s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say:<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee; and we will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> when ye <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee: they have well <S%H3190>said<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

O <S%H4310>that<s%> <S%H5414><s%> there <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H3824>heart<s%> in them, that they would <S%H3372>fear<s%> me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H3605>always,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> it might be <S%H3190>well<s%> with them, and with their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%>
Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H7725>Get<s%> you into your <S%H168>tents<s%> again.

But as for <S%H859>thee,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> thou <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H5978>by<s%> me, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H3925>teach<s%> them, that they may <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> therefore <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and that it may be <S%H2895>well<s%> with you, and that ye may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H3423>possess.<s%>
